description: This simple and satisfying pie is quick to whip up for a midweek meal everyone will love.
name: Beef Mince & Mushroom Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C. Pour the beef mince mix into a large ovenproof dish and top with puff pastry, trimming the edges as necessary. Brush the pastry with butter, cut a steam hole in the middle and bake for 25 minutes, until golden.
